name: Injoit
tag_list: iphone, android, software, development, developer, consulting, project, startup, service, saas, company, innovative, mobile, design, windows-mobile, wm7, amazon, digital, creative
overview:
Injoit, based in London, UK, professionally develops applications for iPhone/iPad and Android.

Has been in iPhone development business since it started, previously worked in web.

Currently working with well known brands as well as small companies. Most of the clients are located in US.

Injoit has its own server side suite QuickBlox.com helping it to build typical applications quicker and provide better users interaction in the apps.

Has launched a number of its own projects including games (ColorShake, Find Me! Spot the Difference), and a platform mobile for developers, digital agencies and businesses called QuickBlox.com.

Injoit is distinguished by its innovative and creative approach, professional staff and happy clients.
